app_info.name: ClashRoyale Tower Monitor
app_info.subtitle: Real-time tower tracking for Clash Royale

app_review_information.notes: This app requires Clash Royale to be installed for full functionality. The app uses iOS screen recording to detect game events locally on device. No external accounts or services are required.
